Brazil.title: Bolsonaro ordered to start serving 27-year prison sentence for Brazil coup plot
Brazil.description: The Supreme Court says the former leader has exhausted his appeals and will start his prison term at a police station in Brasilia.

Brazil.title: Pimco Sells Stake in Troubled Brazil Telecom Operator Oi
Brazil.description: Pacific Investment Management Company sold its entire stake in Oi SA amid a protracted debacle involving the troubled Brazilian telecom operator its creditors.
